languages.text: "Мон-кай так полагаются на обрывки бумаги... Словно каждое слово, написанное вашей рукой, имеет незримую силу".
"Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."
languages.original_text: "Мон-кай так полагаются на обрывки бумаги... Словно каждое слово, написанное вашей рукой, имеет незримую силу".

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “猴子非常依赖废纸……就好像你们写下的每个字，都有着看不见的力量。”
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

traits.locale_text: “猴子非常依赖废纸……就好像你们写下的每个字，都有着看不见的力量。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les mon-keigh et leurs bouts de papier... Comme si chaque mot que vous écriviez possédait un pouvoir invisible. »
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

traits.locale_text: « Les mon-keigh et leurs bouts de papier... Comme si chaque mot que vous écriviez possédait un pouvoir invisible. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los mon-keigh dependéis mucho de esos trozos de papel... Es como si cada palabra que escribís tuviera un poder invisible».
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

traits.locale_text: «Los mon-keigh dependéis mucho de esos trozos de papel... Es como si cada palabra que escribís tuviera un poder invisible».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「モン＝ケイは紙くずに頼りきりだな…手書きの一字一句には目に見えぬ力が宿るとでもいうのか」
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

traits.locale_text: 「モン＝ケイは紙くずに頼りきりだな…手書きの一字一句には目に見えぬ力が宿るとでもいうのか」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Wie abhängig Chem-Pan-Sey doch von Papierfetzen sind ... Als würde von Euren Händen geschriebenen Wörtern unsichtbare Macht innewohnen."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

traits.locale_text: "Wie abhängig Chem-Pan-Sey doch von Papierfetzen sind ... Als würde von Euren Händen geschriebenen Wörtern unsichtbare Macht innewohnen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

languages.text: "Mon-keighler kâğıtla öylesine bütünleşmiş ki... Sanırsın ellerinizle yazdığınız her harfin görünmez güçleri var."
languages.original_text: "Mon-keigh are so dependent on scraps of paper... It is as though every word written by your hands possesses invisible power."

traits.locale_text: "Mon-keighler kâğıtla öylesine bütünleşmiş ki... Sanırsın ellerinizle yazdığınız her harfin görünmez güçleri var."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
